## Contracting Entity
Financial Consumer Agency of Canada (FCAC)
Address: 427 Laurier Avenue West, 6th Floor, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1R 1B9

## GPC and Research Expertise Required
The FCAC seeks a Researcher/Group of Researchers/Research Firm to develop a measure of financial resilience for the organization. The Researcher will:
* Review existing scientific evidence and theory to conceptualize/define financial resilience
* Develop and implement a research strategy to operationalize financial resilience and test the psychometric properties of the measure
* Establish related concepts to be measured based on relevant theory and research evidence
* Develop a measure used to measure financial resilience
* Quantitatively compare the model and index with pre-existing models and indexes of financial resilience
* Validate the new measure of financial resilience on objective and subjective data
* Establish the measure's reliability and invariance across targeted demographic group
* Develop Canadian norms to interpret scores
